languages.text: {n}Бледная Мейв поднимает дрожащую руку.{/n} "Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}, это... буквально в десяти локтях от нас. Господа уже поднимают кубки в честь вас, свое{mf|го|й} спасител{mf|я|ьницы}, ожидая вашего появления. Пойдемте?..."

traits.locale_text: {n}...И улыбается вам.{/n} "Звездн{mf|ый|ая} госпо{mf|дин|жа}, это буквально в десяти локтях от нас. Слышите шум и звон бокалов? Должно быть, господа уже поднимают кубки в честь вас, свое{mf|го|й} спасител{mf|я|ьницы}, ожидая вашего появления. Пройдемте?.."

languages.text: {n}Her face pale, Maive raises a hand.{/n} "My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, it is only a few steps away. The noble lords are already lifting their glasses in their saviour's honour, awaiting your arrival. Shall we... proceed?"
languages.original_text: {n}Бледная Мейв поднимает дрожащую руку.{/n} "Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}, это... буквально в десяти локтях от нас. Господа уже поднимают кубки в честь вас, свое{mf|го|й} спасител{mf|я|ьницы}, ожидая вашего появления. Пойдемте?..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Her face pale, Maive raises a hand.{/n} "My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, it is only a few steps away. The noble lords are already raising their glasses in their saviour's honour, awaiting your arrival. Shall we... proceed?"

{n}Her face pale, Maive raises a hand.{/n} "My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, it is only a few steps away. The noble lords are already lifting their glasses in their saviour's honour, awaiting your arrival. Shall we... proceed?"
"My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, it is literally ten paces away. The noble lords are already raising their glasses in their saviour's honour, awaiting your arrival. Shall we proceed?"

{n}Her face pale, Maive raises a hand.{/n} "My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, it is only a few steps away. The noble lords are already lifting their glasses in their saviour's honour, awaiting your arrival. Shall we... proceed?"

{n}Her face pale, Maive raises a hand.{/n} "My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, it is only a few steps away. The noble lords are already lifting their glasses in their saviour's honour, awaiting your arrival. Shall we... proceed?"

{n}Her face pale, Maive raises a hand.{/n} "My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, it is only a few steps away. The noble lords are already raising their glasses in their saviour's honour, awaiting your arrival. Shall we... proceed?"

{n}Her face pale, Maive raises a hand.{/n} "My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, it is only a few steps away. The noble lords are already lifting their glasses in their saviour's honour, awaiting your arrival. Shall we... proceed?"

languages.text: {n}梅芙面色苍白，举起了一只手。{/n}“来自上界的大人，庆典离我们只有几步之遥。所有贵族都举起了酒杯，等待着救世主的大驾光临。您……要过去吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}Her face pale, Maive raises a hand.{/n} "My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, it is only a few steps away. The noble lords are already lifting their glasses in their saviour's honour, awaiting your arrival. Shall we... proceed?"

traits.locale_text: {n}梅芙面色苍白，举起了一只手。{/n}“来自上界的大人，庆典离我们只有几步之遥。所有贵族都举起了酒杯，等待着救世主的大驾光临。您……要过去吗？”

languages.text: {n}Maive levanta una mano; tiene el rostro lívido.{/n} «Mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial, solo está a unos pasos de aquí. Los señores nobles ya están alzando sus copas para brindar por su {mf|salvador|salvadora} y aguardan su llegada. ¿Nos... nos vamos?».
languages.original_text: {n}Her face pale, Maive raises a hand.{/n} "My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, it is only a few steps away. The noble lords are already lifting their glasses in their saviour's honour, awaiting your arrival. Shall we... proceed?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Maive levanta una mano; tiene el rostro lívido.{/n} «Mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial, solo está a unos pasos de aquí. Los señores nobles ya están alzando sus copas para brindar por su {mf|salvador|salvadora} y aguardan su llegada. ¿Nos... nos vamos?».

languages.text: {n}Yüzü solgun olan Maive, elini kaldırıyor.{/n} "Semavi {mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz}, hemen şurada. Asil lordlar şimdiden kurtarıcılarının şerefine kadehlerini kaldırıyor, gelişinizi bekliyorlar. Gidelim mi?"
languages.original_text: {n}Her face pale, Maive raises a hand.{/n} "My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, it is only a few steps away. The noble lords are already lifting their glasses in their saviour's honour, awaiting your arrival. Shall we... proceed?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yüzü solgun olan Maive, elini kaldırıyor.{/n} "Semavi {mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz}, hemen şurada. Asil lordlar şimdiden kurtarıcılarının şerefine kadehlerini kaldırıyor, gelişinizi bekliyorlar. Gidelim mi?"

languages.text: {n}顔の青白いメイヴは手を上げる。{/n}「天の{mf|君|姫}、少し歩いたところに、貴族のご主人がすでに救世主の栄誉をたたえてグラスを掲げて、あなたのご到着をお待ちです。行きませんか？」
languages.original_text: {n}Her face pale, Maive raises a hand.{/n} "My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, it is only a few steps away. The noble lords are already lifting their glasses in their saviour's honour, awaiting your arrival. Shall we... proceed?"

traits.locale_text: {n}顔の青白いメイヴは手を上げる。{/n}「天の{mf|君|姫}、少し歩いたところに、貴族のご主人がすでに救世主の栄誉をたたえてグラスを掲げて、あなたのご到着をお待ちです。行きませんか？」

languages.text: {n}Pâle comme un linge, Maive lève la main.{/n} « Ce n'est qu'à deux pas d'ici, Votre Céleste Seigneurie. Les nobles seigneurs lèvent d'ores et déjà leurs verres en l'honneur de leur {mf|sauveur|sauveuse}, impatients de vous rendre hommage en personne. Pouvons-nous y aller ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Her face pale, Maive raises a hand.{/n} "My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, it is only a few steps away. The noble lords are already lifting their glasses in their saviour's honour, awaiting your arrival. Shall we... proceed?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Pâle comme un linge, Maive lève la main.{/n} « Ce n'est qu'à deux pas d'ici, Votre Céleste Seigneurie. Les nobles seigneurs lèvent d'ores et déjà leurs verres en l'honneur de leur {mf|sauveur|sauveuse}, impatients de vous rendre hommage en personne. Pouvons-nous y aller ? »

languages.text: {n}Die leichenblasse Maive hebt die Hand.{/n} "{mf|Mein himmlischer Herr|Meine himmlische Herrin}, es sind nur wenige Schritte. Die adeligen Herren erheben bereits ihre Gläser, um auf {mf|ihren Erlöser|ihre Erlöserin} anzustoßen. Sie erwarten Eure Ankunft. Sollen wir ... gehen?"
languages.original_text: {n}Her face pale, Maive raises a hand.{/n} "My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, it is only a few steps away. The noble lords are already lifting their glasses in their saviour's honour, awaiting your arrival. Shall we... proceed?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Die leichenblasse Maive hebt die Hand.{/n} "{mf|Mein himmlischer Herr|Meine himmlische Herrin}, es sind nur wenige Schritte. Die adeligen Herren erheben bereits ihre Gläser, um auf {mf|ihren Erlöser|ihre Erlöserin} anzustoßen. Sie erwarten Eure Ankunft. Sollen wir ... gehen?"
